patientDetails.dateOfBirth: Patient's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format
patientDetails.dateOfExamination: Date of the examination in YYYY-MM-DD format

toothData.toothPresence: P for Present, M for Missing, I for Implant

gingivalMargin.D: Gingival margin for distal (0, R for recession, or O for overgrowth)
gingivalMargin.C: Gingival margin for central (same as above)
gingivalMargin.M: Gingival margin for mesial (same as above)

probingDepth.D: Probing depth for distal in mm
probingDepth.C: Probing depth for central in mm
probingDepth.M: Probing depth for mesial in mm

bleedingOnProbing.D: True or False for bleeding on distal probing
bleedingOnProbing.C: True or False for bleeding on central probing
bleedingOnProbing.M: True or False for bleeding on mesial probing

plaqueIndex.D: True or False for plaque on distal
plaqueIndex.C: True or False for plaque on central
plaqueIndex.M: True or False for plaque on mesial

toothData.notes: Any additional notes for this tooth

notes.generalObservations: General notes and observations for the patient
